title: AIS Cluster Values
description: Schema for configuring ais-cluster Helm Chart. Contains required and optional values, with examples and descriptions.

size.description: Number of nodes in the AIS cluster.

storageClass.description: Storage class defined in K8s cluster, used for AIS mounts

size.description: Size of the storage mount. Must be parsable as a k8s resource.Quantity.

paths.description: List of all mountpaths for each target

protocol.description: Protocol to use for public endpoint.

https.description: HTTPS configuration options (only applies if protocol is https).

skipVerifyCert.description: Skip TLS certificate verification (useful for self-signed certs in testing).

tlsSecret.description: Name of the Kubernetes secret containing TLS cert/key.

imagePullSecrets.description: Array of secrets to use when authenticating with registry for image pulls

initImage.description: Init container image for AIS preparation on startup.

tag.description: Image tag for the init container. Should usually be kept in sync with NodeImage

logSidecarImage.description: Optional sidecar container for log collection and shipping.

cloud.description: Optional cloud secrets for backend providers.

awsSecretName.description: Name of Kubernetes secret for AWS credentials.

gcpSecretName.description: Name of Kubernetes secret for GCP credentials.

ociSecretName.description: Name of Kubernetes secret for OCI credentials.

apiMode.description: Mode for the operator to use when communicating with this cluster. Optional, defaults to using internal K8s service

clusterDomain.description: Kubernetes cluster DNS domain. Optional, defaults to cluster.local.

configToUpdate.description: Update the AIS config directly in spec. See https://github.com/NVIDIA/ais-k8s/blob/main/operator/api/v1beta1/aisconfig.go for valid options

hostnameMap.description: Map node hostnames to the second IP to use.

shutdownCluster.description: Shut down the cluster (dangerous: scales down all pods).

hostpathPrefix.description: Path on node for pod hostPath volumes. Use stateStorageClass if possible.

stateStorageClass.description: StorageClass for dynamically provisioning state/config volumes.

cleanupData.description: Delete all data on cluster removal.

cleanupMetadata.description: Delete all cluster metadata on removal, including state PVCs.

authNSecretName.description: Kubernetes secret for the AIS authN server credentials.

auth.description: Auth specifies the Auth service configuration for admin authentication. If not specified, the operator will look for configuration in the legacy ConfigMap.

serviceURL.description: ServiceURL is the base URL of the AuthN service (scheme + host + optional port, no path). Defaults to 'http://ais-authn.ais:52001'.

usernamePassword.description: UsernamePassword authentication configuration using static credentials.

secretName.description: SecretName is the name of the secret containing AuthN admin credentials (SU-NAME and SU-PASS).

secretNamespace.description: SecretNamespace is the namespace of the secret containing AuthN admin credentials. If not specified, defaults to the AIStore cluster namespace.

tokenExchange.description: TokenExchange authentication configuration using RFC 8693 OAuth 2.0 Token Exchange. This is the preferred method for workload identity.

tokenPath.description: TokenPath is the path to the service account token file. Defaults to '/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token'.

tokenExchangeEndpoint.description: TokenExchangeEndpoint is the AuthN endpoint for token exchange. Defaults to '/token'.

enableExternalLB.description: Creates individual LoadBalancer services for each AIS target.

enableNodeNameHost.description: Uses the K8s node name as the host name for communication over the public interface instead of host IPs.

logsDir.description: Logs directory on host to store AIS logs, mounted as a HostPath volume.

size.description: Number of proxy pods to deploy. If not set, uses cluster size.

annotations.description: Annotations to attach to proxy pods.

labels.description: Labels to attach to proxy pods.

nodeSelector.description: Node selector for scheduling proxies. Omit to use default: nvidia.com/ais-proxy=<cluster name>.

sysctls.description: Custom sysctls for the proxy pod. Unsafe sysctls require kubelet allow-list.

resources.description: Resource requests/limits block. Example format matches core Kubernetes resource definitions.

size.description: Number of target pods to deploy.

annotations.description: Annotations to attach to target pods.

labels.description: Labels to attach to target pods.

nodeSelector.description: Node selector for scheduling target pods. Omit to use default: nvidia.com/ais-proxy=<your cluster>

sysctls.description: Custom sysctls for the target pod. Unsafe sysctls require kubelet allow-list.

resources.description: Resource requests/limits block for target pods.

hostNetwork.description: Set to true to run pods with host networking enabled.

enabled.description: Enable a LoadBalancer service for AIS proxies.

port.description: External port for the AIS proxy LoadBalancer service.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the AIS proxy LoadBalancer service.
